project.name: ImageJ Extensibility Framework
project.description: The ext component is ImageJ's framework for extensibility, which allows for the definition of ImageJ modules, plugins and tools. A module is a discrete piece of functionality with typed inputs and outputs. Plugins, scripts and workflows are all types of modules. A plugin is a piece of code that enables functionality (such as an image processing algorithm) within the program. A tool is a piece of code that defines user input behavior, such as drawing on the image with a pencil, or panning the display by dragging. The extensibility framework also provides a central discovery mechanism for plugins and tools, which allows ImageJ extensions to be loaded dynamically.
